welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ladue, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, upscale shopping, and rich history. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves primarily domestic flights for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
